'Damian Jones' (born 30 September 1964) is a [[BAFTA]]-winning English
producer. http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0427827/awards Damian Jones
awards

Damian Jones has produced over twenty feature films including [[Adulthood
(film)|Adulthood]], [[The History Boys (film)|The History Boys]], [[Welcome to
Sarajevo]], [[Gridlock'd]], [[Millions]], [[Sex & Drugs & Rock & Roll (film)]],
[[The Iron Lady (film)]] and Fast Girls (film). Jones is currently producing
"Powder Room (film)" and [[Belle]]. He is the founder of DJ Films and was co-
founder of Dragon Pictures and Mission Pictures.

Damian has recently inked a first look deal with PathÃ© following their
collaboration on [[The Iron Lady (film)]].
